subtitle: A nice and simple recipe that can be cooked in the oven or microwave. Use home-made or ready-made basil pesto.

method.text: Halve the tomatoes. Scoop out the seeds and flesh. Stand upside down to drain for 10 min. Spoon some pesto into each tomato half.
To microwave: arrange the tomato halves on a plate. Cover with microwave film and cook on full power for 3 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> min.
To bake: Preheat oven to 180°C and bake for 10 min.

title: Baked tomatoes
